item.title: Sarcos Technology Robotics Corp S-1
item.description: Sarcos Technology Robotics Corp, which is in the General Industrial Machinery & Equipment, Nec [3569] industry, SEC S-1 filing on May 13, 2022 had 70848 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
